message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.MM 

This paper deals with zero-shot learning for pose classification, which is a problem commonly studied in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves taking into account the importance of attributes for each class, which is a technique commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also introduces a new dataset for pose classification based on wearable sensors, which could be relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and multimedia (cs.MM) research.
